title: Why did Kanye West buy a ranch in Wyoming for $14 million? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why not? He can certainly afford it. And BTW $14 million doesn’t buy THAT much of a ranch. Here’s one for $30 million; "The Cottonwood" only 11,138 deeded acres. Not a real big ranch by Wyoming or Montana standards.  Wyoming is a beautiful place, I’m sure he’ll like it.
